code: var dayArr=["星期日","星期一","星期二","星期三","星期四","星期wu","星期六"];export var currentTime=function currentTime(){var now=new Date();return{time:"".concat(pad(now.getHours()),":").concat(pad(now.getMinutes())),date:"".concat(now.getFullYear(),"/").concat(pad(now.getMonth()+1),"/").concat(pad(now.getDate())),day:"".concat(dayArr[now.getDay()])};};export var pad=function pad(x){return x<10?"0".concat(x):"".concat(x);};
